name: sonic-flow
description: Immersive task management app with ambient sounds and pomodoro timer

scripts.dev: cd electron && npx tsc && cd .. && concurrently -n vite,tsc,electron -c cyan,yellow,green "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd electron && npx tsc --watch" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && electron ."
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../electron && npx tsc
scripts.dist: rm -rf release && npm run build && electron-builder
scripts.dist:mac: rm -rf release && npm run build && electron-builder --mac
scripts.dist:win: rm -rf release && npm run build && electron-builder --win
scripts.postinstall: cd frontend && npm install && npx electron-rebuild -f -w better-sqlite3
